Posts.Content: Oct 24, 2008 06:41PM enjoyeachday wrote: I have had bone mets for 1 1/2 yrs and something that I like to remember is that we are living with a chronic disease not necessarily a terminal disease.  I've been on femara and zometa this whole time and am doing well.  Remember to take time to care for yourself.
Posts.Title: bone metastisis mimi73 LuAnnH
